pr_title: Run linkcheck in GHA instead of Jenkins

timeline.message:
Run linkcheck in GHA instead of Jenkins

There are currently sporadic 403.
Running the check with separate GHA job will allow us to see failures
but won't block a merge.

timeline.bodyText: do we need java, also probably the name Setup Gradle Java is not relevant here.
timeline.author: kovrus
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,3 +24,27 @@ jobs:
         uses: eskatos/gradle-command-action@v1
         with:
           arguments: :server:test -Dtests.crate.run-windows-incompatible=${{ matrix.os == 'ubuntu-latest' }}
+
+  linkcheck:
+    name: Sphinx linkcheck
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Setup Gradle Java
